## GridTools.getAllGridValidationErrors() function

Utility function to get all current validation errors. Useful for displaying validation summaries or debugging.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllGridValidationErrors: () => {
    resourceId: string;
    columnId: string;
    error: string;
}[]
```
**Returns:**

{ resourceId: string; columnId: string; error: string; }\[\]
